appendStringToFile()

FileUtil.php : 126

Appends the specified string to the specified file.

public static appendStringToFile(string $string, string $filename) : mixed
Parameters
$string : string

the string to append.

$filename : string

the name of the file that is appended.

Tags
throws
PhpCapException

if an error occurs.

Return values
mixed —

false on failure, and the number of bytes appended on success.

writeStringToFile()

FileUtil.php : 82

Writes the specified string to the specified file.

public static writeStringToFile(string $string, string $filename[, bool $append = false ]) : mixed
Parameters
$string : string

the string to write to the file.

$filename : string

the name of the file to write the string.

$append : bool = false

if true, the file is appended if it already exists. If false, the file is created if it doesn't exist, and overwritten if it does.

Tags
throws
PhpCapException

if an error occurs.

Return values
mixed —

false on failure, and the number of bytes written on success.
